channel.title: Updating Skill Levels
channel.description:
When I update my skill level and xp to 135 level and 995000000 xp it keeps the next level xp (what xp I have is the old 99 max xp) Is there anyway to make it say 995000000 out of 995000000?
Also the hitpoints level will not go above 99... even after using the set skill commands to 135 and same with xp command.
Any help?

item.title: Updating Skill Levels
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Okay well This is what I did… coding wise.

playerLevel[0] = 135;
playerXP[0] = 995000000;

Did that to all 20 ids (skills)

And changed the max xp from 14391160 to 995000000. Yet when I login my hp level is 99/99 and the xp for it is 995000000 out of 14391160(xp to next level)

And all the skills are now updated to level 135/99 (except hp) and their xp is set to 995000000 out of 14391160(xp to next level).

Make any more sense?

Read full topic

item.title: Updating Skill Levels
item.dc:creator: @Thedup Thedup
item.description:
@Thedup wrote:

Omg, I Can Maybe Help You, but i don’t really understand what the hell are you talking about.

Read full topic
